text: "Sunday Morning Call" is the third single off English rock band Oasis' fourth studio album Standing on the Shoulder of Giants. The song was released on 3 July 2000. The music video for the song is a take on the movie One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest. The music video was shot in an old mental institute in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Sunday Morning Call" on YouTube Category:2000 songs Category:Oasis (band) songs
title: Sunday Morning Call
